title: XDA Forums are now open for the Nothing Phone 1, Moto Edge Plus (2022), and Redmi Note 11S 4G
content:
Since we last added forum pages for some of the latest smartphones, OEMs have released two exciting devices — the Motorola Edge Plus (2022) and the Redmi Note 11S 4G/POCO M4 Pro 4G. We’ve now opened XDA forum pages for these two phones, along with one for the upcoming Nothing Phone 1. Motorola Edge Plus

The post XDA Forums are now open for the Nothing Phone 1, Moto Edge Plus (2022), and Redmi Note 11S 4G appeared first on xda-developers.
description: XDA Forums for the Motorola Edge Plus (2022), Redmi Note 11s 4G, and the upcoming Nothing Phone 1 are now live!
